attributes.action: To debate the closure of Holyrood and the Scottish Executive.
attributes.additional_details: It is time Holyrood was closed and all powers returned to Westminster and the nation run properly as a United Kingdom.
attributes.background:
The Scottish Government has shown it is incapable of running our country. 
It has refused to accept the result of the 2014 Independence referendum and continually threaten more division with Indyref2.
